verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Now, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> will you judge, <S%H8199><s%> will you judge <S%H8199><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city? <S%H5892><s%> yes, you shall show <S%H3045><s%> her all <S%H3605><s%> her abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Then say <S%H559><s%> you, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> The city <S%H5892><s%> sheds <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of it, that her time <S%H6256><s%> may come, <S%H935><s%> and makes <S%H6213><s%> idols <S%H1544><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> herself to defile <S%H2930><s%> herself.

You are become <S%H816><s%> guilty <S%H816><s%> in your blood <S%H1818><s%> that you have shed; <S%H8210><s%> and have defiled <S%H2930><s%> yourself in your idols <S%H1544><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have made; <S%H6213><s%> and you have caused your days <S%H3117><s%> to draw near, <S%H7126><s%> and are come <S%H935><s%> even to your years: <S%H8141><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I made <S%H5414><s%> you a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and a mocking <S%H7048><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> countries. <S%H776><s%>

Those that be near, <S%H7138><s%> and those that be far <S%H7350><s%> from you, shall mock <S%H7046><s%> you, which are infamous <S%H2931><s%> <S%H8034><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> vexed. <S%H4103><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> were in you to their power <S%H2220><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>

In you have they set light <S%H7043><s%> by father <S%H1><s%> and mother: <S%H517><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you have they dealt <S%H6213><s%> by oppression <S%H6233><s%> with the stranger: <S%H1616><s%> in you have they vexed <S%H3238><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the widow. <S%H490><s%>
You have despised <S%H959><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> things, and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

In you are men <S%H582><s%> that carry <S%H7400><s%> tales <S%H7400><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood: <S%H1818><s%> and in you they eat <S%H398><s%> on the mountains: <S%H2022><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you they commit <S%H6213><s%> lewdness. <S%H2154><s%>

In you have they discovered <S%H1540><s%> their fathers' <S%H1><s%> nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> in you have they humbled <S%H6031><s%> her that was set <S%H5079><s%> apart <S%H5079><s%> for pollution. <S%H2931><s%>

And one has committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> with his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife; <S%H802><s%> and another <S%H376><s%> has lewdly <S%H2154><s%> defiled <S%H2930><s%> his daughter <S%H3618><s%> in law; <S%H3618><s%> and another <S%H376><s%> in you has humbled <S%H6031><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

In you have they taken <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H7810><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%> you have taken <S%H3947><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> and increase, <S%H8635><s%> and you have greedily gained <S%H1214><s%> of your neighbors <S%H7453><s%> by extortion, <S%H6233><s%> and have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> therefore I have smitten <S%H5221><s%> my hand <S%H3079><s%> at <S%H413><s%> your dishonest <S%H1215><s%> gain <S%H1214><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have made, <S%H6213><s%> and at <S%H5921><s%> your blood <S%H1818><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you.

Can your heart <S%H3820><s%> endure, <S%H5975><s%> or can your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong, <S%H2388><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> that I shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with you? I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, and will do <S%H6213><s%> it.

And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> you in the countries, <S%H776><s%> and will consume <S%H8552><s%> your filthiness <S%H2932><s%> out of you.
And you shall take your inheritance <S%H2490><s%> in yourself in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is to me become <S%H1961><s%> dross: <S%H5509><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they are brass, <S%H5178><s%> and tin, <S%H913><s%> and iron, <S%H1270><s%> and lead, <S%H5777><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace; <S%H3564><s%> they are even the dross <S%H5509><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you are all <S%H3605><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> dross, <S%H5509><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will gather <S%H6908><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

As they gather <S%H6910><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> and brass, <S%H5178><s%> and iron, <S%H1270><s%> and lead, <S%H5777><s%> and tin, <S%H913><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3564><s%> to blow <S%H5301><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> on it, to melt <S%H5413><s%> it; so <S%H3651><s%> will I gather <S%H6908><s%> you in my anger <S%H639><s%> and in my fury, <S%H2534><s%> and I will leave <S%H5117><s%> you there, and melt <S%H5413><s%> you.
Yes, I will gather <S%H3664><s%> you, and blow <S%H5301><s%> on you in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath, <S%H5678><s%> and you shall be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> therof.

As silver <S%H3701><s%> is melted <S%H2046><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3564><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall you be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> thereof; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have poured <S%H8210><s%> out my fury <S%H2534><s%> on you.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to her, You are the land <S%H776><s%> that is not cleansed, <S%H2891><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> rained <S%H1656><s%> on in the day <S%H3117><s%> of indignation. <S%H2195><s%>

There is a conspiracy <S%H7195><s%> of her prophets <S%H5030><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> thereof, like a roaring <S%H7580><s%> lion <S%H738><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey; <S%H2964><s%> they have devoured <S%H398><s%> souls; <S%H5315><s%> they have taken <S%H3947><s%> the treasure <S%H2633><s%> and precious <S%H3366><s%> things; they have made her many <S%H7235><s%> widows <S%H490><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

Her priests <S%H3548><s%> have violated <S%H2554><s%> my law, <S%H8451><s%> and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> things: they have put no <S%H3808><s%> difference between <S%H996><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> and profane, <S%H2455><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have they showed <S%H3045><s%> difference between <S%H996><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean, <S%H2889><s%> and have hid <S%H5956><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and I am profaned <S%H2490><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> thereof are like wolves <S%H2061><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey, <S%H2964><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> and to destroy <S%H6><s%> souls, <S%H5315><s%> to get <S%H1214><s%> dishonest <S%H1215><s%> gain. <S%H1214><s%>

And her prophets <S%H5030><s%> have daubed <S%H2902><s%> them with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar, seeing vanity, <S%H7723><s%> and divining <S%H7080><s%> lies <S%H3576><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> have used oppression, <S%H6233><s%> and exercised robbery, <S%H1498><s%> and have vexed <S%H3238><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy: <S%H34><s%> yes, they have oppressed <S%H6231><s%> the stranger <S%H1616><s%> wrongfully. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4941><s%>

And I sought <S%H1245><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%> among them, that should make <S%H1443><s%> up the hedge, <S%H1447><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> in the gap <S%H6556><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me for the land, <S%H776><s%> that I should not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it: but I found <S%H4672><s%> none. <S%H3808><s%>

Therefore have I poured <S%H8210><s%> out my indignation <S%H2195><s%> on them; I have consumed <S%H3615><s%> them with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath: <S%H5678><s%> their own way <S%H1870><s%> have I recompensed <S%H5414><s%> on their heads, <S%H7218><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
